name: Glynk - Private Communities
description: Glynk is the best platform to connect with members in your community. It is private, highly secure and safe. If your community is already on Glynk, please reach out to your community manager to get your access code. If you are not on Glynk yet but looking to join our fast growing network, please have your community manager reach out to us from here: https://glynk.com  Features  Get a warm welcome from the community manager and the members as soon as you join.  Instantly discover members in your community who share the same interests or background  Easily search for members by name, location, college, company, profession, hometown etc.  Smart groups ensure you are automatically added to all the important groups that matter to you. Of course, you can create your own private groups and invite other members to join.  Anytime you have a question or need a recommendation or feel like sharing something with your community, just head to the feed and start interacting.  Use the Gallery to share all your beautiful moments with your community.  Free to meet? Just shake your phone and Milo will instantly connect you with others who are also free. Meet up and get to know others better!  Questions? write to us at: ping@glynk.com
